name: end line
description:
welcome to the game

  

ASDW = move the character

Q = use healing item
Mouse = move the crosshairs
left click = shoot
right click = trigger speed equal to dodge

   

12345 = select weapons

Barra = drop bomb "hidden in the scenery, easter egg"

I hope you like it and enjoy the game

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VqpF9-ux-K4
